title: Let's Build a Time Machine With Pickles and Sadness

media:group.media:title: Let's Build a Time Machine With Pickles and Sadness
media:group.media:description:
The line at the end was pinched from Clifford Stoll, who read it off of a bell in the Hayes Hall bell tower. (More here: https://youtu.be/Gj8IA6xOpSk)
Books what I wrote, yo ► https://tinyurl.com/ycnl5bo3 


Discord server ► https://discord.gg/76ybBSR  (just in case that doesn’t work: discord.gg/exurb1a)
My most recent attempt at a book ► https://tinyurl.com/y5zj33s5 (you may need to change your region accordingly: .co.uk, etc) 

I also make horrendous music ► https://soundcloud.com/exurbia-1 
For sending personalised insults ► https://www.facebook.com/exurb1a/ 
Help me to do this full-time, if you're deranged enough ► https://www.patreon.com/exurb1r?ty=h 
The rest of my books ► https://tinyurl.com/ycnl5bo3
Proclaim your hate for the channel with t-shirts  ► https://teespring.com/stores/exurb1a

A little experiment conducted by undergraduates into measuring local time at different elevations. https://arxiv.org/pdf/1710.07381.pdf

I totally butchered the ‘higgs isn’t everything’ explanation. A much, much better job was done by Veritasium.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ztc6QPNUqls

And once again, if Christmas is a thing you’re doing, a very merry Christmas to you indeed. 

Music used: 

March of the Toy Soldiers – Tchaikovsky https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LmlEmi2HxjY

Jupiter – Holst https://youtu.be/Gu77Vtja30c
